title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Jimbo and Ned.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Hi, I'm Jimbo Kern, and this here is Ned. Say 'Hi', Ned.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: M-hi, Ned.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Now, idn't that great?  We have a terrific show for you today: we're gonna kill some elk, and we're gonna kill some mountain goats. Now, the new law passed by Colorado legislature, which Ned and I call 'Pussy Law #4', states that we can no longer kill animals in defense.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
role: IN ORDER. SELF DEFENSE CAN ONLY

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
role: In other words, our old line of 'It's comin' right for us'-

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: It's comin' right for us.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: -no longer works. So now, we only kill naimals to, quote, thin out their numbers. If we don't hunt, then these animals will grow too big in number and they won't have enough food. So you see, we have to kill animals, or else they'll DIE.  Uuh. So, roll the tape.  Here we are at Shafer's Crossing lookin' for some animals.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Looky, Ned, there are some deer!  Quick, Ned. Thin out their numbers!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Thin out their numbers!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Good work, Ned. Now, they won't starve.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: That sure was a great hunting trip. We saved those deer from extinction.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Mmmwe're environmentalists.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Comin' up next, we're gonna drop some napalm on an unsuspecting family of beavers. And also, try to thin out the numbers of some endangered species.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: South Park Elementary. Class is in session. Mr. Garrison writes

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Mr. Garrison, what's Vietnam?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: What's Vietnam? A question a child might ask, but not a childish question. Heheheheheheheheheh. Children, for the next few days, we'll be learning all about Vietnam. Chances are that somebody in your own lives was affected by this incredible war.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: That's right, Mr. Garrison. The Vietnam War was sticky and icky.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Mr. Garrison. Were you in Vietnam?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Mr. Garrison frowns as he seems to recall an incident in that war. An injured man is dragged to a helicopter as fresh troops wait to replace him

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Aaawwwgh. Aaawwwgh.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Come on, men! Jump out of the chopper!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Call the doctor! Call the doctor!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: The class is waiting. Now Mr. Garrison is smiling as the next scene begins. A group of men is seen disrobed and bathing. At the end of it, he laughs to himself

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Who's next to take a shoowwerr?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Me-ee.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: I am.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: You just took one last week, silly.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Oh, where can I hide this big pipe?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: No, I wasn't in Vietnam. But sometimes, I like to pretend I was. Anyway, children, I'm going to assign you all a paper.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: AAWWWW!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Son of a bitch.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: I want you all to find somebody in your own life who was in Vietnam, and interview them about it.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: What if we don't know anybody who was in Vietnam?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Then you get an 'F', fail the third grade, and have to get a job cleaning septic tanks to support your drug habit.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Oh.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Dude. My uncle Jimbo was in Vietnam.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Hey yeah. He and Ned do that stupid TV show.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Back to Huntin' and Killin'

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: And now, time for

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
role: [the letters are wavy and uneven. The boys come to see the taping]
text: One of our loyal viewers from South Park sent us some 8mm film of what he claims to be the Mexican Staring Frog of Southern Sri Lanka. Now, as you all know, the Mexican Staring Frog of Southern Sri Lanka can supposedly kill you with one horrid gaze. If a person even so much as looks into the frog's eyes, they can be paralyzed, or even die. And this film proves that that frog may very well exist. [it plays. Shown is a snowy field, with the camera looking from behind some blades of grass] Now watch carefully, you're gonna see the Mexican staring frog. [nothing seems to be happening] There! There, did you see it? Roll that back again! [the film is replayed] Now, freeze it! [the film is frozen, and there's an object flying through the air.] Well, I'd like to know what all you skeptics have to say now! What do you think, Ned?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Mwhoa, I'm scared.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Well, be sure to join us next time. Until then

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
role: We're so glad you spent your time with us

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
role: While we slaughtered our way through nature's guts

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
role: Come again and stay a while

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
role: We'll kill a lot more living things to make them bleed

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Mmgood night.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Aand we're cut. Great show, guys.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Oh, looky who's here. My little nephew, Stanley.  So, you're interested in your Uncle Jimbo's big TV show, huh?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: No. We have to do a stupid report on Vietnam. You and Ned are the only guys we know who were there.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Oh. Yeah, we sure were.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Was it fun?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Cartman, what kind of stupid-ass question is that?! Of course it was fun!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Well, sure Vietnam was fun. But not like goin-to-the-circus fun, or fly-fishin-in-Montana fun. No, Vietnam was more like shovin' shards of broken glass up your ass and then sittin' in a tub of Tabasco sauce fun.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Whoa!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Yeppur, that's where me and Ned met. I remember I had just gotten off the Ferris wheel.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Oh, boy, what a gorgeous day!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Kern, get over here! The new privates are here. I'm assigning one of them to you as a trainee. Ned Gerblansky.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Ned Gerblansky reporting, sir.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Thanks, Ned. Now, the bad guys have been spotted about ten clicks north of here. I know that you and Kern are best suited to take them out. Are you up for it?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Sir, yes, sir!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Soon it was all on just me and Ned to win the war for America.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Pass me some more cocoa, will you, Ned?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Certainly. And would you like another muffin as well?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Why the hell not? We're at war.  Hey, you know those things are bad for your throat.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: No, that's all lies. I'll be fine. Charlies, at 2 o'clock!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: I see 'em! Drop the bomb!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: The bomb's not releasing!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Oh, no!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: It won't budge.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Then we only have one option.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: What are you doing, man!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: We have to take 'em out, Ned! At all costs! Die, you red Commie bastarts!!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Jeeaawwww!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Eeeeehhhh-oh no! Out of ammo!  We did it, Ned! We killed the entire Viet Cong army!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Whoopie!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Let's get back to base camp. We can ride the log ride before it closes!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: And that's the way it happened, boys.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Wow!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Man, Vietnam was sweet!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
role: Great news, guys. Your TV show ratings have doubled!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Wow!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: They've gone from six people, to twelve.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Holy Smokes! We could get an Emmy!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: South Park Public Access. The set of Jesus and Pals

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: We've got to do it, J. Your ratings are being killed by the Jimbo and Ned hunting show.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: But I don't really care about that.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Wuhell, you'd better care, Mr. Smarty Pants. No ratings means no show. If you want to keep reaching out to people, you have to keep up with the times.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: (Tsk) ooh, alright.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Aright we're ten second to air, guys.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Remember: big, big, big.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: And five, four, three,

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: It's your Hour of Power on Mission Mountain Cable Access! Put your hands together and welcome the only man in town who always has a fully-stocked wine cellar, Jeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeesus Christ.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Uuuh. Hi.  Uh, yeh-yeah, okay. Beginning today, we're taking the show in a new direction.  We've got some very interesting people coming on the show this week for you, our viewers. Today's guest is- TV's Gilligan. Mr. Bob Denver.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: And here's uh Booooobbb Denver.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Hi, Bob Denver.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Hi, Jesus. Great to be here ahem.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: So. Bob. So, yu-you just get in town?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Yup. Just got in.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: So. Um. Su-so, wwhat have you been up to?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Nn-nothing. Nothing really at all.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Nothin' from nothin' leaves nothin'

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Oh boy.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: South Park Elementary. Stan is presenting his group's report

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: and after killing the entire Viet Cong army, they returned to base camp. Once there, they rode the Devil's Drop roller coaster and ate cotton candy. And ultimately, Ned got the Purple Heart for his courageous defense of the log ride.  So was the horror of Vietnam. The End.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: The End.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Are there any questions?  Yes, Mr. Garrison?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Yes, uh.  Where the fuck did you hear this ridiculous load of bullshit?!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: From a Vietnam veteran.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Well, boys, it's obvious to me that you didn't do your work, and that you stayed up all night thinking up some ridiculous lie!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: No, no, we didn't-

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: You all receive an F. Minus.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: F minus? Can he do that?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: But-eh, but we're not making it up! And wuh-

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Stanley, the Vietnam war was war! There weren't galloping steeds or singing birds or logrides!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: How do you know?! You weren't even there!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Well that's it! All of you have detention for the rest of the week!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Aawwww!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: After school, at the cafeteria. Mr. Mackey is supervising

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Too bad.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Welcome to detention. Mkay. Mr. Garrison told me about your little joke. Important for you all to know why you are in detention. For you to obtain the full benefits from it.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: You're dead, Stan.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: For what, dude?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: (Just face it, dude, your uncle's stupid!)

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: You're here because you are inferior, mkay? You're here because you are awkward, mkay?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Well, thanks a lot, Stan, for having such a cruel uncle that got us all detention for a week!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Yeah, dude. Your uncle Jimbo sucks ass!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Shh! 'Kay?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Why would he just invent a story instead of telling us the truth?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Well, let's see. Maybe 'caauuse he's an old drunk hillbilly dick!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Shh! 'Kay?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: We've gotta get him back, dude!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Totally!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: How?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Well, he screwed us by makin' something up; I say we do the same thing!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Whattaya mean?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Did you guys ever see that one Brady Bunch where the guy bzzzt

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: That sounds sweet. Ah, yeah, sweet. Yeh, super sweet! Ahyes!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Jimbo and Ned back on the set

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: And now back to Huntin' and Killin' with South Park's favorite hunters, Jimbo and Ned.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Welcome, hunters. Boy, have we got a show for you today! We have just received a tape from another viewer who filmed the Mexican staring frog of Southern Sri Lanka right here in South Park.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Aaaaa.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Yes, now we're about to roll the film, but remember: if you look the Mexican staring frog in the eyes, you could go catatonic. We don't know if this applies to pictures of the frog or not, but who wants to take chances? So when we roll this film, be sure to look away. Okay, roll the film, Tom.  Is it over?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
role: Okay, it's over. [they lower their arms and sit up] Well, there
text: you have it. Undeniable proof that the Mexican staring frog of Southern Sri Lanka exists. And you saw it here, on the Jimbo and Ned show.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Cartman's house. The boys are looking at the show and smiling

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Dude, I can't believe they fell for it!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Yeah, what a couple of dumbasses.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: (Yeah, it's like killing a dead pig and a turkey.)

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Yeah.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Come on! We've gotta make another one!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Lying kicks ass!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Jesus and Pals

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Jesus!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Yeah.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: We're in trouble. The Jimbo and Ned show made up some ridiculous staring frog story and jumped another two points in the ratings!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Uh oh, sssooo what are we supposed to do?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: I don't know. We'll have to- continue with the changes we've made and then- go even further.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: And we're back in five, four, three,

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Remember: big, big, big.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Show time! Jesus and Pals has a new openng sequence, with Jesus walking backwards into view and throwing his jacket over his shoulder. Meanwhile, 'Jesus and Pals' scrolls along the bottom as both his logo drops down from above. His signature blinks here and there. A montage follows with Jesus talking to a monkey in one screen and Jesus waiting for calls in another. The last thing you see is

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: If you're just joining us, we've been listening to Michelle's incredible story of survival. Go on, Michelle.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Well, as I was saying, I tried to drive him over to our gorgeous wood bench. My husband was trapped for twelve hours.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: And yet somehow he managed to survive.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: That's right. He's a very brave man, and I love him very much.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: I love you, too.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Wwell, let's see if the audience has any questions.  Yes, uuh, you over there.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: I think she needs to kick him to the curb, baby!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Kick who to the curb?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Her no-good husband! She's got to lose that zero and get herself a hero!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Buut-

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: He wants to have his cake and eat it, too. He's got to dump that trash, girlfriend. It's all about respect. You've got to have respect for yourself.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Uuh-I think we've somewhat missed the point here. Let's go to somebody else. Yes, your comments.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Montel, I think we're forgetting something very important in all this. Okay, sure, he touched some children, but, the man is a great singer and he has entertained us for so many years.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Wha- What are you talking about?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Michael Jackson! All this baad-mouthin', puttin' the man down. Maybe he did touch some children now and then, but come on! It's Michael Jackson, Michael Jackson!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Uh, we'll be back right after these messages.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: In the woods, the boys set up for another staring frog video. Cartman is behind some boulders and Kyle is in front of them. Stan and Kenny face them

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Ready, you guys?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Ready.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Okay. Action!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Blululululululuh. I am the deadly Mexican staring frog of Southern Sri Lanka! I am very scary. And dangerous.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Cut! Cartman!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: What?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: It's supposed to be a frog!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: I know that!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Wuh since when do frogs talk, Cartman?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: It's a Sri Lanka frog.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Drrr, Cartman!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Drrr yourself, hippie!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Just do it again, Cartman, and don't make it talk!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Okay. Here we go, ready?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Are you ready Cartman?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: I'm ready, Steven Spielberg!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Action!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Blulululuh. Screw you guys.

text: Another clip. The boys are in town

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Wait, why do I have to dress up like a old lady?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Because old ladies are fat, and you are, too!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: It's not funny!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Come on, Cartman. The way we're filming this, nobody will even know it's you.

text: They'd better not!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Okay, when I yell 'action,' you start to walk this way.  And Kenny's gonna pull the plastic frog in front of you, and you have to be scared.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Scared? Of a plastic frog?

text: It's acting, Cartman. You have to pretend you're really scared. Then the Mexican staring frog will look you in the eyes, then you fall down, like you're dead. Okay? You ready?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Huh this is stupid.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Good! Aaand action!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Eee-ee-ee-ee!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Jimbo and Ned back on the set

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Well, it appears that now a lot of you uh "skeptics" thought that the film we showed of the Mexican staring frog of Southern Sri Lanka was a fake. That you say it didn't harm anybody. Well, it just so happens that we just received another film from another anonymous viewer.  Roll it.  There you go. Proof that not only is this frog real, but it is doing harm to the people of South Park as we speak.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Mmmm. Damn that frog!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Well, that does it! All this week, Ned and I will be risking life and limb as we on location to hunt the Mexican staring frog of Southern Sri Lanka! Join us, won'tcha?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Jesus and Pals. His producer was watching Huntin' and Killin'

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Ooh, nonono no!  This is the biggest publicity stunt I've ever seen! Damn, those hunters are clever!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Uuuh, clever?

text: It's genius, it really is. Hell, I even want to watch then hunt the Mexican staring frog. Unless

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Unless what?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Unless we can prove to the world that the whole thing is a sham. If we prove that the Mexican staring frog of Southern Sri Lanka is just something- mmade up by Jimbo and Ned, we can have them taken off the air, perhaps even killed!

text: Look, why don't we just stick to our own show. People will watch again.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Oh, J. You are so omnipotent, and yet so naive. We launch a full investigation, and in the meantime we can cash in on the videotapes.

text: as he interviews them]

text: Yeah, it was left on our answering machine. All it said was that they saw the Mexican staring frog just south of Stark's Pond this morning.

text: Yeup.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Man, I was in Tet. We had a bad-ass roller coaster, but all we ever wanted was a log ride. We waited and we waited, but they never built us one. I think- Danforth wanted the log ride more than anybody, but he he had to settle with that lame dinosaur water adventure ride.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: That was was hell on everybody.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Good. Okay. Okay, bye! Good news, everybody. This week's ratings are through the roof! We're up to twenty people!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Wow, do we got more money?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: No, but I do. We're now the highest rated show on Mountain Cable Access! God bless the Mexican staring frog!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: The boys are back in the woods, and their frog is on a small boulder

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Dude, they're gonna look so stupid.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Dude, totally!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: They deserve it for lying to us, dude!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Revenge is so very, very sweet.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: They're here! Hurry and hide!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Let's hunt!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: We'll start with a two-shot of you and Ned getting your equipment together and-

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Mmjimbo, look!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Hit the deck!!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: What is it?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: It's him! The Mexican staring frog of Southern Sri Lanka! He's right over there on that rock!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: He is?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Dumbass, you've got to keep your eyes away from him.  Stay down. Ned, you take flight position; I'll try to keep it turned away from you.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Mmrr roger that.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Hello, fellow hunters. Have we got a show for you today.  The Mexican staring frog is sunning itself on a rock directly behind us.  We've got to take the frog by surprise. I'm gonna create a diversion using this incendiary device  while Ned will ambush him from the rear. Now, Ned. He's not lookin'.  Quick, Ned, hit him with the shotgun! Now, Ned!  Ned? Ne-ed.  Oh, no!  Come on, Ned buddy, snap out of it!  Come back to me, buddy.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: You getting all this?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Hold on to your butts.  Take that, you demon frog!!  Ned, Ned. Can you hear me?  Somebody, call an ambulance. This man is catatonic!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Get the Flight for Life helicopter!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Holy crap, dude.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Hell's Pass Hospital. Jimbo is at Ned's bedside reading to him

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: but Pony Boy was beat up pretty bad. He kept saying, 'stay gold.'  Aw, Ned. If you can hear me, yyou've got to snap out of it, 'cause if you don't, uh- I'll never forgive myself.  Aw, Stanley, he's gone! My only friend in the world is gone!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Dude, he's okay. That frog wasn't even real!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Look!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Aaww! What the hell are you doin'? I almost looked right at it!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Dude, it's just a plastic frog; it's not real. Check it out!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: What?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: We shot all those videos and sent them in.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Yeah, we made the whole thing up. It was all just a really, really funny joke!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: You sent in those videos?!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Oh, this is not good.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: My best friend is a vegetable, and I'm gonna be the laughing stock of South Park!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Aw, come on. Ned's faking it. That frog was just a piece of plastic!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Yeah. Come on, Ned. Quit fakin'.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: You boys don't understand. Ned was so freaked out by the idea of the Mexican staring frog that he must've sent himself into a deep coma.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: It's a psychosomatic response.  I couldn't help overhearing your conversation just now.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Who are you?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: I produce a little TV show called Jesus and Pals, you might have heard of it. Your story is amazing: full of jealousy, duplicity, backstabbing, and bitterness.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Uuuuuuuuh. Thanks?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: How would you like to share your remarkable story with us on tomorrow's show?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: JESUS AND PALS, AFTER A COMMERCIAL BREAK. TODAY'S TOPIC Tots in Trouble.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: We're back with Jimbo and his nephew Stan. These kids can't stop lying, can't they?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: That's right, Jesus. No respect for their elders. As some of you may know, I host a local show on hunting.  Thanks. We've been hunting the Mexican staring frog for a week based on some video footage we received from a viewer. Well, it turns out that these kids faked the footage!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Is that true, Stam?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: It was just a joke; we didn't think it would hurt anybody.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Uh, we'll find out more about this debauchery when we return.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Aaand we're out.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: You're corpses out here! We need a lot more action from everybody!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Like what?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Like, go ahead and tell how your nephew Stan takes drugs and worships Satan.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Satan. Got it.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Whoa, I don't take drugs and worship Satan. That's a lie.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Give you a taste of your own medicine, you little fibber!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: You kids, I didn't bring you on this show to be boring. Somebody get pissed off and throw a chair at Ned here.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Remember, you all start to fight after the chair is thrown: that is your cue.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Roger.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: the theme music plays again and the crowd applauds for the next segment. Action

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
role: Jesus	Welcome back to Jesus and Pals. Jimbo, why do you think
text: little Stanley lies?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: I'll tell you why. Because he's on drugs and worships the Devil.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Jeesus! Jeesus! Jeesus!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Wow. Now, Stanley, it sound like your uncle is really worried about you.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Well I only- did it 'cause he- molested me.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Why, you little piece of crap!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: You big piece of crap!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: That's it! Now I'm all pissed off! Take that, hippie!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Hey!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Jeesus! Jeesus!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: O-Okay, okay, that's enough.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Take that, you asshole!  What the fuck was that?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Uh, let's watch the lanugage, people.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Bring it on, you bitch!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Ey, get off of him, you fuckin' nutsack!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Jeesus! Jeesus! Jeesus!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Let's all just- make our way back to our seats.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: (Nononono-yikes!)

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Yeah, yeah, yeh-oh?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Oh my God! They've killed Kenny!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: You bastards!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Ey, you guys!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Let's all just- make our way back to our seats.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Nooooo!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Oh my Gooodd!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: SHUT THE FUCK UP!!  Jesus, what is wrong with you people?! Look around you, Stanley. Look at all the pain and suffering your lie has caused.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Wull we only did it because Jimbo lied to us first. We had this report on the Vietnam War for school, and we interviewed Jimbo about it and he made up all this stuff about Vietnam, and he got us in trouble.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Hey, now. Everything I told you boys about the war actually happened.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Mr. Garrison said that there was no way you could have defeated the entire Viet Cong army by yourself.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: The entire Viet Cong army?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: I uh Well, okay, I might have embellished the truth a little, but that's different.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Is it?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Well, sure. I mean, eh  Well, no uh, I guess not.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: And as for you, Stan uh, I think you need to kick your drug habit pretty soon.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Wait a second-I don't take drugs-that was a lie!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Wait. Jimbo made that up?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: No. Your producer did.  She made Jimbo tell everybody that I did drugs.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: What?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: During the break. Your producer came over, and told Jimbo what to say about me. She told him to lie!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: It's true. She did. Hu-I'm such a tool.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Oh, really?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Yeah! Then she told us to throw a chair at Ned!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Yeah. I didn't wanna do it, Jesus. They made me do that.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Screw this show. I thought this was all real.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: W-wait, everybody. Come back.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Don't feel too bad, Montel. We all want to touch children sometimes; it's only natural.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Outside South Park Public Access. Show's over.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: I'm sorry, Stan uh, I was just trying to tell a good story. I never meant for you boys to get in trouble.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Well, we're sorry too, Uncle Jimbo. We're sorry for making you look stupid in front of the whole world.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Yeah. And we're sorry for turning Ned into a vegetable.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Aw, he'll be fine. I'll just take him home and show him some good hard-core porn-he'll snap right out of it. Won't you, Ned?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: I want to apologize to all of you for what happened in there. In our competition for ratings we lost sight of why we got into show business in the first place.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Yeah. TV's and beer.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Actually, I was referring more to the pursuit of truth, but-well anyway, I can't wait to get back to my old show without all the glitz and the ratings and producers and-

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Wait a second. Where is your producer?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: I sent her away.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Sent her away where?

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Hell. She enters Satan's lair with phone in hand

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: What is, is- What's happening?!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Welcome to my dominion!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Noooooo!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Hey. Take a load off. Put your feet up. Me and Satan were just aboot to go shopping for furniture. Come on, Satan.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Okay, honey.

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
text: Noooooo!

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
role: [End of The Mexican Staring Frog of Southern Sri Lanka...

title: THE MEXICAN STARING FROG
role: It's hell for you and me.]
